com.microsoft.bingads
Class OAuthTokenRequestException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              com.microsoft.bingads.OAuthTokenRequestException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OAuthTokenRequestException
extends RuntimeException

This exception is thrown if an error was returned from the Microsoft Account authorization server. To resolve this exception you can first check the stack trace to see the error details, in case there is some action you can take to resolve the issue. For example you might have specified an invalid client ID.

See Also:
